post.description:
Calculate completion metrics and create TrainingCompletion record.

Calculates:
- attendance_percentage based on attendance records
- learning_hours from session durations attended
- Updates enrollment status to COMPLETED

get.description: Get all training completions for a user.
Get detailed completion record.

post.description:
Calculate learning hours for a year and award appropriate badge.

Badge tiers:
- BRONZE: 20+ hours
- SILVER: 40+ hours
- GOLD: 60+ hours
- PLATINUM: 80+ hours

get.description: Get all badges earned by a user.
